Reviews.Title: “Piazza Euclide - This is no Grand Hotel Ritz”
Reviews.Author: WorldEuropeanTravel
Reviews.Content: cesar ritz grave stayed ths ritz grand hotel french tradition suspicious italian hotel name witness italian judging inferior quality hotel name implies caveat emptor tiny service lousy prices astronomical stay hotel centro storico barcafe piazza save money pensione closer piazza venezia avoid booking hotel costs

Reviews.Title: “If you can, select another hotel...”
Reviews.Author: ndlsavage
Reviews.Content: fiasco trying book hotel online dont own own website broken door hinge chewed breakfast disaster coffee worst tasted expect italian hotel bar staff slow rude reviews key cards absolutely system fails easily key card didnt bother check id name summary shockingly bad steer

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: jeannie459
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel prior med cruise apprehensive location distance city centre train station corner getting central rome easy surrounding hotel upper class residential safe walking evening staff helpful local information suite top floor breakfast continental coffee recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “too old and too expensive”
Reviews.Author: NatassaPl
Reviews.Content: hotel comes sixties renovation wall papers tired textiles curtain bathroom breakfast poor quality bad 34 choices hotel spend 245 euro triple

Reviews.Title: “GOOD VALUE HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: curryqueen
Reviews.Content: found hotel value comfortable breakfast adequate selection distance city bus service 910 goes outside hotel termini tip tickets station corner hotel remember activate tickets 75 minutes boarding inspectors target tourists fined 50 euros bought tickets hadnt activated taxi hotel terravision termini cost 15 euro including 2euros luggage noise slight major reception staff bit surly helpful recommend organised trips evening panoramic tour costing 41 euros ripoff chapel tour costs 56 euros people book told 4hour wait youre tour tried ourselves metro train near vatican 2 stops met lots tour guides offering trip 40 euros ourselves queues cost 15 euros covered vatican sistine chapel pay 7 euros la cupola highly recommend climb views spectacular add queues season

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and quiet”
Reviews.Author: Italychaperone
Reviews.Content: surprised comfort hotel due error matrimonial bed protested helpful desk guy sleep pullout couch rome tour guide hammered italian beds own suite walls curtains bedspreads air brothel extremely comfortable bath lovely jet tub didnt mind center rome bigger neighborhood quiet looking nightlife spot rest days sightseeing fine train stop takes city walk via del corso breakfasts leave bit desired adequate request real coffee unless satisfied nescafe machines waitstaff grateful euro bring coffee morning dinner tour stay finish pasta main courses fresh vegetables rome guide demanded salad day otherwise canned peas norm overall stay tour probably traveling own cater tours
